attributes.action: We need homes too! We need more 1,2 and 3 bedroom affordable start up homes!
attributes.background: Developers are building 4,5 and 6 bedroom luxury houses costing £600 - £900 thousand. We need more affordable start up homes if we are to tackle the housing problem. How can people get on the housing ladder when the first 4 rungs are missing! The government needs to step in and act on this now!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to give tax breaks for developers of smaller homes, or perform another specific action.
